Comment.Language: The hymn Icyermegi is chanted followed by the melody in the same tune:

Text.Language: Icyermegi a~fene: vacileoc v~roi a~non: kekappeci e~v/le: devde p~rockenicomen: devde c~yinae~pagic.
Baxio bavonh e~nimagoc: perrou eth/t n~nie~neh: e~nivul/ t/rou m~p~kahi: e~nai t/ren teno~uw~sht: m~pentaumacf etsepm~kah.
V~lepi magoc de yaume: zwi neni etae~lloca: e~nimagoc autacsoure: yeo~nan m~mon n~tac e~pe: ke n~nakxaci a~jia.
Nimagoc joust enis~f/ri: efonhn~nau e~tau ]wo~u: e~nimagoc n~naudwron: euhwc m~V] pentebetg~vof: t~sepeo~unak petentoua~i.
Itouparyenoc tekauca: ke/~y/ou n~nant~ropic: logoc Yeoc e~nivul/: mayayon muct/rion: yontokotou Emmanou/~l.
Aci] paryenoc n~te pac n~swpe: afoj m~pennoten tefn~roma: auv~noute afsanouon: je m~muct/rion: penets~pw n~Emmanou/~l.
Nao#c# Kurioc ke i~pomeni: '~ine n~tou yaumayayo: w~o~u m~voo~u aulakcaut/c: pacoi e~niv/le tect/c: marenmakarizomen autou.
B~r~p p~neumata pentafswpe: ws m~mofpe piyavma: pantafw~s ouoh n~q/tf: w~nidele t/rou m~p~kahi: maren makarizin m~moc.
Reftoc n~tou A~a~ron: centou agennetou: tenneck~liyoc alwcw: epen tonf~reo~n: taute p~roc kenicwmen.
T~serof n~hanjij n~A~a~ron: ous~v/ri m~p~neuma nafk~layoc: m~berrepi ref]ho: tenimagoc n~hebrioc: a~moi ten/ren n~teno~uw~st.
Voc akfoyec e~nitelen: keran pep~liriyima: t~callatec matemagoc: o~ue~pouten picteucwmen: ]m~perrocia n~te ou,~rictou.
Pio~w~ini e~bolqen pio~uw~ini: afmoh t/ren n~resa: n~a~ri'alin o~nimagoc: ania~ynahte marennehte: eybe p~jini~ m~Pi,~rictoc.
